type.name: project_event_item
type.description: This select is a extends the assignments of an event to Project instances.

entity.name: Project
entity.description: A Project is a work effort that one more people and organizations participate in.

explicit.name: id
explicit.description: the identification of the project assigned by the organization

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: words by which the project is known.

explicit.name: participants
explicit.description: words by which the project is known.

entity.name: Project_assignment
entity.description: A Project_assignment assigns an Project to product data.

explicit.name: assigned_project
explicit.description: the Project to be assigned to product data.

explicit.name: items
explicit.description: the product data to which the Project is assigned.

description.p: A Project_relationship specifies that two projects are related. This is a foundation concept which may be refined in other modules. This concept can be used to define sequencing.

explicit.name: relation_type
explicit.description: an optional type descriptor for the relationship.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: an optional description of the relationship.

explicit.name: project1
explicit.description: the Project to be related to project2.

explicit.name: project2
explicit.description: the Project to be related to project1.
